channel.title: CVE Feed for n/a -- deno

item.title: CVE-2023-26103|2023-02-25T05:00:01.387Z -- n%2Fa -- deno
item.description: Versions of the package deno before 1.31.0 are vulnerable to Regular Expression Denial of Service (ReDoS) due to the upgradeWebSocket function, which contains regexes in the form of /s*,s*/, used for splitting the Connection/Upgrade header. A specially crafted Connection/Upgrade header can be used to significantly slow down a web socket server.
